dict.acceptation: 人造的；人工的；虚假的，非原产地的；人为的；

sent.orig: There are two meanings in the word ARTIFICIAL and unreal or false.
sent.trans: 在英文中Artificial这个词有两个含义，一是人工的，二是假的。

sent.orig: Does Not Contain: Yeast, wheat, soy, milk, sugar, starch, artificial color, artificial flavor or artificial sweeteners.
sent.trans: 不含有发酵粉，大豆，牛奶，糖，淀粉，人工色素，人工香料，人工甜味剂。

sent.orig: Yeast, wheat, soy, gluten, milk, starch, artificial flavors, artificial colors artificial sweeteners, alcohol or honey.
sent.trans: 酵母，小麦，大豆，麸质，牛奶，淀粉，人造香料，人工色素，人造甜味剂，酒精及蜂蜜。

sent.orig: Free from added sucrose, gluten, yeast, wheat, milk derivatives, artificial colours and artificial flavours.
sent.trans: 不含蔗糖，谷朊粉，酵母，小麦，奶制品，人工色素和人工香料。

sent.orig: Our company also manufactures artificial nylon hair, upscale artificial hair, accessories for makeup brushes.
sent.trans: 我司还经营各种尼龙毛、高档毛、各种化妆笔刷零配件。
